rules_text:
Vigilance, reach, haste
Whenever Bravi, the City Alive attacks, target creature has base power and toughness 8/8 until end of turn.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
